course_description: This course offers 3 hours of independent research study credit. Participating students are matched with a member of the Emory faculty (or an advanced graduate student) and conduct independent research under the faculty member's supervision. May be repeated up to a total of 12 credit hours.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3742, Section #: 1, Type: RSC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: H. Tworzecki, Status: Closed
